original_text: Then the Lord said to me, ‘Arise, go down quickly from here, for your people whom you have brought from Egypt have acted corruptly. They have turned aside quickly out of the way that I commanded them; they have made themselves a metal image.’
korean_text: 내게 이르시되 일어나 여기서 속히 내려가라 네가 애굽에서 인도하여 낸 네 백성이 스스로 부패하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 도를 속히 떠나 자기를 위하여 우상을 부어 만들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to me,
Arise, go down quickly from here,
for your people have acted corruptly.
They are the ones you brought from Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네가 이집트에서 인도해 낸 자들이니,

sentences.original_text: They have turned aside quickly from the way
they have made themselves a metal image.’
